summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Axecraft Minecraft server website. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend navigation, interactions, and core features functioning correctly. Minor issues with some content sections visibility.

design_issues.issue: Stats section not clearly visible on homepage scroll
Reviews section not easily found during scroll testing
